page.title: 20Rattlesden - Transport
page.content:
Many households have private transport and some are two car families.
Rattlesden has one bus daily to Bury St. Edmunds - this bus calls at Drinkstone Green - for workers, plus one additional bus on market days (Wednesday and Saturday).
Borley Green has 1 market day bus to Stowmarket (Thursday).
A taxi service operates from Rattlesden Garage.
!____________________________________! ! This survey has been compiled by ! ! { Joyce Coleman, June Field}and ! !{ Wendy Guyler}who are members of ! !{ Woolpits Womens Institute. } ! !____________________________________!
